topics.body:
So I watched the first episode of FMAB

It's interesting, but I'm neither leaning towards being really interested in it nor being pushed away from it immediately

So for now, it's... ok
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f5587c63687251537f0400#post_54f5587c63687251537f0400
Brotherhood is a much more faithful adaptation of the manga. I know some people that preferred the original FMA but I've always liked Brotherhood way more. If only in that it doesn't cut Olivier Armstrong. Because she is the fucking coolest.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: Also, It looks like I'll have to use Kissanime to watch splash star. (Because the Torrent that's on Curecom just won't connect to the peers for some reason.)
